answers.truthfulness-2_justification: Margaret Thatcher led a government that set out to take a sledgehammer to the post-war consensus and therefore drove through a large number of radical policy proposals, helped by healthy parliamentary majorities.

notes.current_text: The evidence states that she was Prime Minister and that she implemented policies known as Thatcherism
notes.raw_text: The evidence states that she was Prime Minister and that she implemented policies known as Thatcherism
notes.text_left: The claim is that Margaret Thatcher implemented policies.
notes.text_right: . So, the answer to the question is true.

response.name: Margaret Thatcher: Policies of the Thatcher Premiership
